name: prodeq2d
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c0, c2)))
bodyPretty: ⊢ (w0 → prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= prod(s0 ∈ c0, c2))

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c0, c2)), wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c2)))
stmt.pretty: syl(w0, prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= prod(s0 ∈ c0, c2), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 = c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c0, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c2)))
-| wi(wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c2)), wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c0, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c0, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c2)))
-| wi(wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c2)), wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c0, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c2)), wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c0, c2)))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c0, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c2)))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

comment: Equality deduction for product. Note that unlike ~ prodeq2dv , ` k ` may occur in ` ph ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 4-Dec-2017.)
